mapper.select: SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY reaction_count DESC) AS rank, article.id, article.title, article_reaction.reaction_count as `count` FROM article article LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, COUNT(*) AS reaction_count FROM article_reaction WHERE TYPE = #{reactionType} GROUP BY article_id ) article_reaction ON article.id = article_reaction.article_id ORDER BY rank;
